languages.text: "А эта..." {n}Взгляд, направленный на левую руку, подернут туманом горечи.{/n} "Эту я получил в крюйт-камере, где погибла моя жена, Эльсинора. Произошло возгорание, пламя подбиралось к боеприпасам. И я не про патроны для авторужей — там были снаряды для {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушек{/g}".

"As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} shells."
languages.original_text: "А эта..." {n}Взгляд, направленный на левую руку, подернут туманом горечи.{/n} "Эту я получил в крюйт-камере, где погибла моя жена, Эльсинора. Произошло возгорание, пламя подбиралось к боеприпасам. И я не про патроны для авторужей — там были снаряды для {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушек{/g}".

There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I do not mean autogun rounds, they were macro-cannon shells."

"As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} shells."

"As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} shells."

languages.text: "Was die hier angeht ..." {n}Er betrachtet verbittert seine linke Hand.{/n} "Die hier habe ich aus dem Munitionsdepot, in dem meine Frau Elsinora starb. Ein Feuer war ausgebrochen und die Flammen näherten sich der Munition. Und ich meine keine Sturmgewehrmunition ... nein, das waren Granaten für {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g}."
languages.original_text: "As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} shells."

traits.locale_text: "Was die hier angeht ..." {n}Er betrachtet verbittert seine linke Hand.{/n} "Die hier habe ich aus dem Munitionsdepot, in dem meine Frau Elsinora starb. Ein Feuer war ausgebrochen und die Flammen näherten sich der Munition. Und ich meine keine Sturmgewehrmunition ... nein, das waren Granaten für Makro-Kanonen.

languages.text: « Quant à celle-ci... {n}fait-il en posant sur sa main gauche un regard empreint d'amertume,{/n} je l'ai reçue dans le dépôt où ma femme Elsinora a trouvé la mort. Il y a eu un incendie, les flammes se rapprochaient dangereusement des munitions qui y étaient entreposées... Et je ne vous parle pas de cartouches de fusil d'assaut, mais d'ogives destinées aux macro-canons, rien que ça. »
languages.original_text: "As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were macro-cannon shells."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à celle-ci... {n}fait-il en posant sur sa main gauche un regard empreint d'amertume,{/n} je l'ai reçue dans le dépôt où ma femme Elsinora a trouvé la mort. Il y a eu un incendie, les flammes se rapprochaient dangereusement des munitions qui y étaient entreposées... Et je ne vous parle pas de cartouches de fusil d'assaut, mais d'ogives destinées aux macro-canons, rien que ça. »

« Quant à celle-ci... {n}fait-il en posant sur sa main gauche un regard empreint d'amertume,{/n} je l'ai reçue dans le dépôt où ma femme Elsinora a trouvé la mort. Il y a eu un incendie, les flammes se rapprochaient dangereusement des munitions qui y étaient entreposées... Et je ne vous parle pas de cartouches de fusil d'assaut, mais d'ogives destinées aux macro-canons, rien que ça. »

languages.text: «En cuanto a este...». {n}La mirada que echa a su mano izquierda está llena de resentimiento.{/n} «Me lo hice en el polvorín donde perdió la vida mi Elsinora. Se declaró un incendio, y las llamas estaban peligrosamente cerca de las municiones. Y no me refiero a balas de rifle automático, sino a los obuses de los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g}».
languages.original_text: "As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} shells."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a este...». {n}La mirada que echa a su mano izquierda está llena de resentimiento.{/n} «Me lo hice en el polvorín donde perdió la vida mi Elsinora. Se declaró un incendio, y las llamas estaban peligrosamente cerca de las municiones. Y no me refiero a balas de rifle automático, sino a los obuses de los macrocañones».

languages.text: 「これは…」{n}彼が自分の左手に向ける視線は、苦渋に満ちたものだった。{/n}「妻のエルシノーラが死んだ弾薬庫で手に入れたものです。火事が起きて、炎が弾薬へと向かっていた。オートガンの弾じゃありませんよ…{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}の砲弾だったんです」
languages.original_text: "As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} shells."

traits.locale_text: 「これは…」{n}彼が自分の左手に向ける視線は、苦渋に満ちたものだった。{/n}「妻のエルシノーラが死んだ弾薬庫で手に入れたものです。火事が起きて、炎が弾薬へと向かっていた。オートガンの弾じゃありませんよ…マクロキャノンの砲弾だったんです」

languages.text: “至于这个……”{n}他看着左手，目光中充满了苦涩。{/n}“这是在弹药库里弄的，就是我妻子埃尔茜诺拉牺牲的地方。当时着了火，熊熊大火离弹药越来越近。我指的不是自动枪的子弹，而是{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}的炮弹。”
languages.original_text: "As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} shells."

traits.locale_text: “至于这个……”{n}他看着左手，目光中充满了苦涩。{/n}“这是在弹药库里弄的，就是我妻子埃尔茜诺拉牺牲的地方。当时着了火，熊熊大火离弹药越来越近。我指的不是自动枪的子弹，而是宏炮的炮弹。”
“至于这个……”{n}他看着左手，目光中充满了苦涩。{/n}“这是在弹药库里弄的，就是我妻子埃尔茜诺拉牺牲的地方。当时着了火，熊熊大火离弹药越来越近。我指的不是自动枪的子弹，而是宏炮的炮弹。”

languages.text: "Bunu ise..." {n}Bakışları, büyük bir kederle sol eline kenetleniyor.{/n} "Bunu eşim Elsinora'nın öldüğü cephanelikte aldım. Yangın çıkmıştı ve alevler, mühimmata fazlasıyla yaklaşmıştı. Ototüfek mermilerini kastetmiyorum. Bahsettiğim şey, {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro top{/g} kovanlarıydı."
languages.original_text: "As for this one..." {n}The look he directs at his left hand is full of bitterness.{/n} "I got this one in the ammo depot where my wife Elsinora died. There was a fire, and the flames were getting close to the ammunition. And I don't mean autogun rounds — these were {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} shells."
